thread.title: Un-Cruise Adventures Hires Two Business Development DirectorsTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Un-Cruise Adventures Hires Two Business Development DirectorsTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Un-Cruise Adventures Hires Two Business Development DirectorsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Un-Cruise Adventures Hires Two Business Development Directors Published on : Thursday, July 16, 2015
Un-Cruise Adventures, a small ship cruise line based in Seattle and Juneau, Alaska has
hired two new professionals to its outside sales team. Julie Quarry and Cyndi Denman join the company in new positions as business development directors.
“Both Cyndi and Julie have impressive travel industry credentials,” said Tim Jacox, president and COO. “Their experience is a welcome addition to our sales team, and we look forward to expanding our presence and introducing more travel agents to the Un-Cruise Adventures difference.”
As a business development director based in Arizona, Julie Quarry is responsible for growing and strengthening sales relationships with travel agencies in the Midwest and western United States. Quarry will also manage the company’s relationships with AAA Clubs and select key accounts.
A 30-year travel industry professional, Quarry has spent most of her career working with national accounts, AAA, Signature and Virtuoso. She was most recently the director of business development at Country Walkers. Other positions include director of national accounts at Trafalgar Tours, ten years with Cruise West as director of national accounts, and outside sales manager at Glacier Bay Tours & Cruises. She has a degree in travel and tourism from Knapp College of Business and is an accomplished photographer.
Cyndi Denman joins the company as business development director charged with training and building relationships with travel agency partners in California. She is based in Alameda, California. Denman will also manage select key accounts for the line.
Most recently, Denman spent five years with Ponant Yacht Cruises and Expeditions as sales director for North America & Canada. Other work experience includes director of national accounts at Pleasant Holidays; director of national accounts at Cruise West; Jewel River Cruises’ director of sales for western US and Canada; and sales positions at Costa Cruise Line, Air Jamaica, and Continental Airlines Vacations. She earned a bachelor’s degree at University of Nevada, Las Vegas.
Un-Cruise Adventures’ fleet of boutique yachts and small ships carry 22-88 guests on adventure and river cruises from one week to 21 nights. Expansive explorations hug shores in Alaska’s Inside Passage, Hawaiian Islands, Mexico’s Sea of Cortes, Columbia/Snake Rivers, Pacific Northwest, Galapagos, and Costa Rica/Panama. Adventure activities, tours, and presentations are included.
